title: overbehind
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Overbehind par Flor
Breathe in, it's a lie
Out of control, it grows wild
You get me scared
You can't keep down
Live and learn
Turn back around

Take it in light, you can keep it
I don't mind, I don't mind
Keep it in sight, you can leave it
I don't mind, I don't mind
Placing it's ghost in your story
I don't mind, I don't mind
But you can't live over your shoulder
Over behind


It should be easy, still I hide
I disappoint myself but it's alright

Take it in light, you can keep it
I don't mind, I don't mind
Keep it in sight, you can leave it
I don't mind, I don't mind
Placing it's ghost in your story
I don't mind, I don't mind
But you can't live over your shoulder
Over behind

Ooh, the other side
I had a dream, what a paradise
Hidden far from my critical light
In the dark it'll all feel alright

Take it in light, you can keep it

I don't mind, I don't mind
Keep it in sight, you can leave it
I don't mind, I don't mind
Placing it's ghost in your story
I don't mind, I don't mind
But you can't live over your shoulder
Over behind

Take it in light, you can keep it
I don't mind, I don't mind
Keep it in sight, you can leave it
I don't mind, I don't mind
Placing it's ghost in your story
I don't mind, I don't mind
But you can't live over your shoulder
Over behind

Take it in light, you can keep it

I don't mind, I don't mind
Keep it in sight, you can leave it
I don't mind, I don't mind
Placing it's ghost in your story
I don't mind, I don't mind
But you can't live over your shoulder
Over behind

You'll be taking it light
Keep it in sight
Placing it's ghost in
You can't live over
